items.sentence: I\'d like to thank Tom for everything he\'s done for us.
Tom might have missed the train. He hasn\'t arrived yet.
Tom grabbed Mary\'s arm and pulled her towards the door.
Tom hadn\'t eaten anything the whole day and was hungry.
It\'s difficult bringing up a child who isn\'t your own.
She advised him to catch the first train in the morning.
There is an urgent need for them to update their system.
You should spend more time outside and less time inside.
Tom Jackson wrote his first book before he was thirteen.
Tom had solar panels installed on the roof of his house.
